name: Mahjong Prime 3D
description:
Are you ready to enjoy a whole new way to play and experience mahjong? Then you’ll love Mahjong Prime 3D – the last mahjong game you’ll ever need!

***STUNNING GRAPHICS***

Mahjong Prime 3D features spectacular graphics that have to be seen to truly be appreciated.

In addition to 3D graphics, you can choose basic graphics, or play the essential tile game in the shadows of Greek ruins, or on the beach. Whatever your preference, your senses will come alive! The game features 7 different tile sets.

***MULTIPLE GAME MODES***

Enjoy four different game modes to keep things fresh and interesting. Choose from classic, two turns, memory or two corner.

***TEST YOURSELF***

Whether you’re a mahjong novice or a master player, the app’s high score counter will help you test your improving skills game after game.

***TRY IT TODAY***

Mahjong Prime 3D is designed for iPhone and iPad. Try it today and see why it’s the last Mahjong game you’ll ever need!
